vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMsg in Log.addMessage (patch_5.sol#45) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.deposit (patch_5.sol#16-21):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_5.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_5.sol#20)

external-function

solc-version

Detected issues with version pragma in patch_5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_5.sol#1): it allows old versions
